questions.question: What will be the cancellation charges?
questions.answer: If cancelled before processing, a 5% fee applies. After processing, cancellation may not be possible.

questions.question: What is the refund policy?
questions.answer: Full refund if visa is rejected due to our documentation. Partial refund (95%) if cancelled before processing. Refunds processed within 7 days.

questions.question: If my visa is rejected, will I get any refund?
questions.answer: Yes, full refund if rejection is due to our provided documents and verified with a stamped embassy letter.

questions.question: Can the flight reservation be rescheduled or changed?
questions.answer: Yes, changes can be made before booking expiry (24–72 hours).

questions.question: What are the charges for rescheduling or name corrections?
questions.answer: Minor name corrections are free if not ticketed. Rescheduling may have standard service charges depending on urgency.

questions.question: Can I add additional passengers later?
questions.answer: Yes, additional passengers can be added with extra charges based on the pricing table.

questions.question: Can I correct spelling mistakes in the passenger’s name?
questions.answer: Yes, minor corrections before ticketing are allowed. Major changes require a new booking.

questions.question: Will the ticket be a reservation or a confirmed booking?
questions.answer: For visa purposes, it will be a reservation (not ticketed) unless otherwise requested.

questions.question: Is the booking verifiable on the airline’s website?
questions.answer: Yes, all reservations are verifiable and include a valid PNR.

questions.question: How long is the booking valid?
questions.answer: Typically valid for 24–72 hours depending on the airline.

questions.question: Is the booking cost adjustable if I confirm the actual ticket later?
questions.answer: No, itinerary and ticket bookings are separate services.

questions.question: Are there any hidden fees?
questions.answer: No hidden charges. All costs are shown before payment.

questions.question: Will I receive an official booking confirmation with PNR?
questions.answer: Yes, an official booking confirmation and PNR will be emailed.

questions.question: Can I use the same booking for multiple visa applications?
questions.answer: Yes, as long as it remains valid.

questions.question: Can I choose my preferred seat while booking?
questions.answer: Yes, most airlines allow seat selection. Premium seats may cost extra.

questions.question: Is online check-in included?
questions.answer: Yes, online check-in is available via airline’s website or app, usually 24 hours before departure.

questions.question: Will I get an e-ticket and booking reference (PNR)?
questions.answer: Yes, a valid e-ticket and PNR will be emailed after confirmation.

questions.question: Can I book a multi-city or connecting flight in one ticket?
questions.answer: Yes, multi-city and connecting flights can be booked together depending on airline availability.

questions.question: What is the free baggage allowance?
questions.answer: Depends on airline: Economy (20–30kg checked + 7–10kg cabin), Business (30–40kg checked + 10–15kg cabin).

questions.question: What are the charges for extra baggage?
questions.answer: Varies by airline and route, typically $10–$30 per kg.

questions.question: Is cabin baggage included?
questions.answer: Yes, standard cabin baggage is included.

questions.question: What are the cancellation charges after booking?
questions.answer: Depends on fare rules. Non-refundable tickets can’t be refunded; refundable ones may have $20–$100 cancellation fee.

questions.question: Can I change travel dates?
questions.answer: Yes, with change fee + fare difference.

questions.question: Can I change the passenger’s name after booking?
questions.answer: Minor corrections allowed; major changes need new booking.

questions.question: Are there any hidden fees?
questions.answer: No hidden fees. All applicable charges shown before payment.

questions.question: Can I pay in installments or EMI?
questions.answer: Depends on payment gateway; some support EMI/credit card installments.

questions.question: Does the price include all taxes and surcharges?
questions.answer: Yes, unless otherwise specified.

questions.question: Can I request a meal preference?
questions.answer: Yes, meal preferences like veg/non-veg or special diet can be selected.

questions.question: Can I add extra legroom or priority boarding?
questions.answer: Yes, available at extra cost.

questions.question: Are wheelchair assistance or special needs services available?
questions.answer: Yes, advance notice required.

questions.question: Can I add travel insurance?
questions.answer: Yes, usually offered as an optional service.

questions.question: What documents are required at check-in?
questions.answer: International: Passport + Visa + PNR; Domestic: Govt ID + PNR.

questions.question: How early should I reach the airport?
questions.answer: International: 3 hours before; Domestic: 2 hours before.

questions.question: If my flight is delayed or canceled by the airline, what are my rights?
questions.answer: You may be eligible for rebooking, refund, or compensation depending on airline and local regulations.

questions.question: Will I be rebooked automatically in case of cancellation?
questions.answer: Usually yes, but depends on the airline.
